metadata.title: CVE-2023-52666 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ksmbd:fix potential circular locking issue in smb2_set_ea() smb2_set_ea() can becalled in parent inode lock range. So add get_write argument tosmb2_set_ea() not to call nested mnt_want_write().

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
